name: KOOSJrKOOSSubscalePainKOOSSubscaleActivitiesOfDailyLivingKOOSSubscaleSymptoms
title: KOOS Jr, KOOS Subscale Pain, KOOS Subscale Activities of Daily Living, KOOS Subscale Symptoms
description: NOTE:  VALUE SET UNDER DEVELOPMENT AS MEASURE TESTING IS ONGOING.
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This value set contains codes to identify the  patient reported outcome tool KOOS Jr. and KOOS subscales of Pain, Activities of Daily Living  and Symptoms used for knee replacement patients.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify knee replacement patients who completed the KOOS JR. or KOOS Pain, Activities of Daily Living or Symptom subscales.   Using the Quality Data Model, this data element maps to the Assessment, Performed datatype.),(Inclusion Criteria: LOINC codes representing the KOOS Jr. and KOOS Activities of Daily Living, Pain and Symptom subscales.),(Exclusion Criteria: Quality of life and sport recreation subscales are excluded from this value set.)
